snippet: The family of a former small-town mayor who the authorities say was shot to death by a police officer he had complained about for aggressive behavior has been awarded $97 million in a federal wrongful death lawsuit.
abstract: South Carolina family of Bert Reeves, former small-town mayor who authorities say was shot to death by a police officer he had complained about for aggressive behavior, is awarded $97 million in federal wrongful death lawsuit.
lead_paragraph: The family of a former small-town mayor who the authorities say was shot to death by a police officer he had complained about for aggressive behavior has been awarded $97 million in a federal wrongful death lawsuit.

headline.main: South Carolina: $97 Million Awarded in Killing
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: $97 Million Awarded in Killing
